name: Amazon RDS
description: The Sumo Logic Amazon RDS app dashboards provide visibility into the performance and operations of your Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS). Preconfigured dashboards allow you to monitor critical metrics of your RDS instance(s) or cluster(s) including CPU, memory, storage, network transmits and receive throughput, read and write operations, database connection count, disk queue depth, and more. CloudTrail Audit dashboards help you monitor activities performed on your RDS infrastructure. MySQL Logs dashboards helps you monitor database errors, slow queries, audit sql queries and generic activities. PostgreSQL logs dashboard help you to monitor database errors, slow queries, database security, and query execution timings.

children.name: 01. Amazon RDS - Overview
children.description: The Amazon RDS Overview dashboard provides insights into RDS resource statistics and utilization throughout your infrastructure, including CPU, memory, latency, storage, and network throughput.
children.title: 01. Amazon RDS - Overview

panels.title: RDS Performance Insights
panels.text:
- __DBLoad__: The number of active sessions for the DB engine. Typically, you want the data for the average number of active sessions. In Performance Insights, this data is queried as db.load.avg.

   - __DBLoadCPU__: The number of active sessions where the wait event type is CPU. In Performance Insights, this data is queried as db.load.avg, filtered by the wait event type CPU.

   - __DBLoadNonCPU__: The number of active sessions where the wait event type is not CPU.

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=DBLoad statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

Namespace={{namespace}} metric=DBLoadNonCPU statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

children.name: 01. Amazon RDS - Overview By Database Instance
children.description: The Amazon RDS Overview By Database Instance dashboard provides insights into resource statistics and utilization per database instance throughout your infrastructure. Panels display data for CPU, memory, latency, storage, and network throughput per database instance.
children.title: 01. Amazon RDS - Overview By Database Instance

queries.queryString:
"\"eventsource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} sourceIPAddress
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and !(src_ip matches "*.amazonaws.com") and isEmpty(error_code)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop  | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| json field=requestParameters "dBInstanceIdentifier", "resourceName", "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier1, resourceName, dBClusterIdentifier1 nodrop
| json field=responseElements "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier3 nodrop | json field=responseElements "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBClusterIdentifier3 nodrop
| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*", dBInstanceIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier3) ) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count by src_ip
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| where !isnull(latitude)

"\"eventsource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} sourceIPAddress
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and !(src_ip matches "*.amazonaws.com") and !isEmpty(error_code)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop  | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| json field=requestParameters "dBInstanceIdentifier", "resourceName", "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier1, resourceName, dBClusterIdentifier1 nodrop
| json field=responseElements "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier3 nodrop | json field=responseElements "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBClusterIdentifier3 nodrop
| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*", dBInstanceIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier3) ) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count by src_ip
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| where !isnull(latitude)

"\"eventsource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop 
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop  | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "dBInstanceIdentifier", "resourceName", "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier1, resourceName, dBClusterIdentifier1 nodrop
| json field=responseElements "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier3 nodrop | json field=responseElements "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBClusterIdentifier3 nodrop
| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*", dBInstanceIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier3) ) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count by event_status
| sort by _count, event_status asc

"\"eventsource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and !isEmpty(error_code)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| json field=requestParameters "dBInstanceIdentifier", "resourceName", "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier1, resourceName, dBClusterIdentifier1 nodrop
| json field=responseElements "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier3 nodrop | json field=responseElements "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBClusterIdentifier3 nodrop
| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*", dBInstanceIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier3) ) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| count as Frequency by error_code, error_message
| top 10 error_code, error_message by Frequency, error_code asc, error_message asc

"\"eventsource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop  | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| json field=requestParameters "dBInstanceIdentifier", "resourceName", "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier1, resourceName, dBClusterIdentifier1 nodrop
| json field=responseElements "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier3 nodrop | json field=responseElements "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBClusterIdentifier3 nodrop
| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*", dBInstanceIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier3) ) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| timeslice 15m
| count by _timeslice, event_status
| fillmissing timeslice(15m), values ("Success", "Failure") in event_status
| transpose row _timeslice column event_status

| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop

| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| timeslice 1s
| count as Frequency by _timeslice, event_name, src_ip, user, type, requestId, user_agent, region, accountId, dBClusterIdentifier, dBInstanceIdentifier
| sort by _timeslice
| limit 100

"\"eventsource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop 
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "dBInstanceIdentifier", "resourceName", "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier1, resourceName, dBClusterIdentifier1 nodrop
| json field=responseElements "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier3 nodrop | json field=responseElements "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBClusterIdentifier3 nodrop
| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*", dBInstanceIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier3) ) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as Frequency by type, user
| topk(10, Frequency) by type | fields -_rank

"\"eventsource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" engine account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com"
| json "requestParameters.engine", "responseElements.engine" as engine1, engine2 nodrop
| if (!isEmpty(engine1), engine1, engine2) as engine
| where !isEmpty(engine)
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "dBInstanceIdentifier", "resourceName", "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier1, resourceName, dBClusterIdentifier1 nodrop
| json field=responseElements "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier3 nodrop | json field=responseElements "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBClusterIdentifier3 nodrop
| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*", dBInstanceIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier3) ) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count as Frequency by engine
| sort by Frequency, engine asc

"\"eventsource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "dBInstanceIdentifier", "resourceName", "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier1, resourceName, dBClusterIdentifier1 nodrop
| json field=responseElements "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier3 nodrop | json field=responseElements "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBClusterIdentifier3 nodrop
| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*", dBInstanceIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier3) ) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| timeslice 15m
| count as Frequency by _timeslice, event_name
| transpose row _timeslice column event_name

"\"eventsource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop 
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "dBInstanceIdentifier", "resourceName", "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier1, resourceName, dBClusterIdentifier1 nodrop
| json field=responseElements "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier3 nodrop | json field=responseElements "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBClusterIdentifier3 nodrop
| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*", dBInstanceIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier3) ) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| count by user, event_name | sort by _count, user asc, event_name asc

panels.title: Database Events from Known Malicious IP Addresses

queries.queryString:
"\"eventsource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} sourceIPAddress
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and !(src_ip matches "*.amazonaws.com")
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop  | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| json field=requestParameters "dBInstanceIdentifier", "resourceName", "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier1, resourceName, dBClusterIdentifier1 nodrop
| json field=responseElements "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dBInstanceIdentifier3 nodrop | json field=responseElements "dBClusterIdentifier" as dBClusterIdentifier3 nodrop
| parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*" as f1, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop | parse field=resourceName "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*" as f1, dBClusterIdentifier2 nodrop
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:db:*", dBInstanceIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier3) ) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (resourceName matches "arn:aws:rds:*:cluster:*", dBClusterIdentifier2, if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier3) ) as dBClusterIdentifier
| count by src_ip, event_name, user, user_agent
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=src_ip
| where  type="ip_address" and malicious_confidence = "high"
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| sort by _count
| fields src_ip, event_name, user, user_agent, type, actor, malicious_confidence

children.name: 02. Amazon RDS - Performance Insights
children.description: The Amazon RDS Performance Insights dashboard provides intuitive performance data from throughout your RDS infrastructure across CPU load, non CPU load, active sessions, and performance trends.
children.title: 02. Amazon RDS - Performance Insights

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=DBLoad statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=DBLoadCPU statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=DBLoadNonCPU statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg

panels.title: RDS Performance Insights
panels.text:
- __DBLoad__: The number of active sessions for the DB engine. Typically, you want the data for the average number of active sessions. In Performance Insights, this data is queried as db.load.avg.

   - __DBLoadCPU__: The number of active sessions where the wait event type is CPU. In Performance Insights, this data is queried as db.load.avg, filtered by the wait event type CPU.

   - __DBLoadNonCPU__: The number of active sessions where the wait event type is not CPU.
   
To enable Performance Insight on database instance read AWS document at https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/USER_PerfInsights.Enabling.html

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=DBLoad statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=DBLoadCPU statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=DBLoadNonCPU statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

Namespace={{namespace}} metric=NetworkThroughput statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=BufferCacheHitRatio statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Deadlocks statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

children.name: 03. Amazon RDS - Non-Describe CloudTrail Audit Events
children.description: The Amazon RDS Non-Describe CloudTrail Audit Events dashboard provides statistical and detailed insights into Non-Describe DB Instance, SnapShot, Cluster, Security group events.
children.title: 03. Amazon RDS - Non-Describe CloudTrail Audit Events

queries.queryString:
"\"eventSource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" !Describe* !List* account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and !(event_name matches "Describe*DBInstance*") and !(event_name matches "Describe*DBCluster*") and !(event_name matches "*DB*Snapshot*")
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBSnapshotIdentifier", "dBParameterGroupName", "dBClusterParameterGroupName", "optionGroupName" as engine1, dBInstanceClass1, dBClusterIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier, dBParameterGroupName, dBClusterParameterGroupName, optionGroupName nodrop  
| json field=responseElements "dBName", "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dbName, engine2, dBInstanceClass2, dBClusterIdentifier2, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop
| concat (dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier2) as dBInstanceIdentifier | concat (engine1, engine2) as engine | concat (dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass2) as dBInstanceClass | concat (dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier2) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(engine1), engine1, engine) as engine
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceClass1), dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass) as dBInstanceClass
| if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier),dBInstanceIdentifier,dBClusterIdentifier) as dbidentifier
| where dbidentifier matches "{{dbidentifier}}" or isempty(dbidentifier)
| count as event_count by event_name
| sort by event_count, event_name asc

"\"eventSource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" !Describe* !List* !*DB*Snapshot* !StartDB* !StopDB* !RebootDBInstance !RebootDBCluster account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and !(event_name matches "Describe*DBInstance*") and !(event_name matches "Describe*DBCluster*") and !(event_name in ("StartDBInstance", "StopDBInstance", "RebootDBInstance","RebootDBCluster"))
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBSnapshotIdentifier", "dBParameterGroupName", "dBClusterParameterGroupName", "optionGroupName" as engine1, dBInstanceClass1, dBClusterIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier, dBParameterGroupName, dBClusterParameterGroupName, optionGroupName nodrop  
| json field=responseElements "dBName", "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBClusterInstanceClass" as dbName, engine2, dBInstanceClass2, dBClusterIdentifier2, dBInstanceIdentifier2, dBClusterInstanceClass nodrop
| concat (dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier2) as dBInstanceIdentifier | concat (engine1, engine2) as engine | concat (dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass2) as dBInstanceClass | concat (dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier2) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(engine1), engine1, engine) as engine
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceClass1), dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass) as dBInstanceClass
| if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier),dBInstanceIdentifier,dBClusterIdentifier) as dbidentifier
| where dbidentifier matches "{{dbidentifier}}" or isempty(dbidentifier)
| count as Frequency by eventTime, event_name, dbidentifier, engine, user, region, src_ip, event_status, dBInstanceClass, dBClusterInstanceClass, dbName, dBParameterGroupName, dBClusterParameterGroupName, optionGroupName, dBSnapshotIdentifier, error_code, error_message
| sort by eventTime | limit 100

"\"eventSource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" (StartDB* or StopDB* or RebootDBInstance or RebootDBCluster) account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and event_name in ("StartDBInstance", "StartDBCluster", "StopDBInstance", "StopDBCluster", "RebootDBInstance","RebootDBCluster")
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBSnapshotIdentifier" as engine1, dBInstanceClass1, dBClusterIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier nodrop  
| json field=responseElements "dBName", "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBClusterInstanceClass", "databaseName" as dbName, engine2, dBInstanceClass2, dBClusterIdentifier2, dBInstanceIdentifier2, dBClusterInstanceClass, databaseName nodrop
| concat (dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier2) as dBInstanceIdentifier | concat (engine1, engine2) as engine | concat (dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass2) as dBInstanceClass | concat (dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier2) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(dbName), dbName, databaseName) as dbName
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(engine1), engine1, engine) as engine
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceClass1), dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass) as dBInstanceClass
| if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier),dBInstanceIdentifier,dBClusterIdentifier) as dbidentifier
| where dbidentifier matches "{{dbidentifier}}" or isempty(dbidentifier)
| count as Frequency by eventTime, event_name, dbidentifier, engine, user, region, src_ip, event_status, dBInstanceClass, dBClusterInstanceClass, dbName, dBSnapshotIdentifier, error_code, error_message
| sort by eventTime | limit 100

"\"eventSource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" *DB*Snapshot* !Describe*DB*Snapshot* account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and event_name matches "*DB*Snapshot*" and !(event_name matches "Describe*DB*Snapshot*")
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBSnapshotIdentifier", "dBClusterSnapshotIdentifier" as engine1, dBInstanceClass1, dBClusterIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier1, dBClusterSnapshotIdentifier nodrop   
| json field=responseElements "dBName", "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBSnapshotIdentifier" as dbName, engine2, dBInstanceClass2, dBClusterIdentifier2, dBInstanceIdentifier2, dBSnapshotIdentifier2 nodrop 
| concat (dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier2) as dBInstanceIdentifier | concat (engine1, engine2) as engine | concat (dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass2) as dBInstanceClass | concat (dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier2) as dBClusterIdentifier | concat (dBSnapshotIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier2) as dBSnapshotIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(engine1), engine1, engine) as engine
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceClass1), dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass) as dBInstanceClass
| if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(dBSnapshotIdentifier1), dBSnapshotIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier) as dBSnapshotIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier),dBInstanceIdentifier,dBClusterIdentifier) as dbidentifier
| where dbidentifier matches "{{dbidentifier}}" or isempty(dbidentifier)
| count as event_count by event_name
| sort by event_count, event_name asc

"\"eventSource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" *DB*Snapshot* !Describe*DB*Snapshot* account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and event_name matches "*DB*Snapshot*" and !(event_name matches "Describe*DB*Snapshot*")
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBSnapshotIdentifier", "dBClusterSnapshotIdentifier" as engine1, dBInstanceClass1, dBClusterIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier1, dBClusterSnapshotIdentifier nodrop   
| json field=responseElements "dBName", "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBSnapshotIdentifier", "dBClusterSnapshotIdentifier" as dbName, engine2, dBInstanceClass2, dBClusterIdentifier2, dBInstanceIdentifier2, dBSnapshotIdentifier2, dBClusterSnapshotIdentifier nodrop 
| concat (dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier2) as dBInstanceIdentifier | concat (engine1, engine2) as engine | concat (dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass2) as dBInstanceClass | concat (dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier2) as dBClusterIdentifier | concat (dBSnapshotIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier2) as dBSnapshotIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(engine1), engine1, engine) as engine
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceClass1), dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass) as dBInstanceClass
| if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(dBSnapshotIdentifier1), dBSnapshotIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier) as dBSnapshotIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier),dBInstanceIdentifier,dBClusterIdentifier) as dbidentifier
| where dbidentifier matches "{{dbidentifier}}" or isempty(dbidentifier)
| count as Frequency by eventTime, event_name, dbidentifier, engine, dBSnapshotIdentifier, dBClusterSnapshotIdentifier, user, Region, src_ip, event_status, dBInstanceClass, dbName, error_code, error_message
| sort by eventTime | limit 100

"\"eventSource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" *DBSecurityGroup* !DescribeDBSecurityGroups account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and event_name matches "*DBSecurityGroup*" and event_name<>"DescribeDBSecurityGroups"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBSnapshotIdentifier", "dBSecurityGroupName" as engine1, dBInstanceClass1, dBClusterIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier, dBSecurityGroupName  nodrop  
| json field=responseElements "dBName", "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dbName, engine2, dBInstanceClass2, dBClusterIdentifier2, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop 
| concat (dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier2) as dBInstanceIdentifier | concat (engine1, engine2) as engine | concat (dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass2) as dBInstanceClass | concat (dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier2) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(engine1), engine1, engine) as engine
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceClass1), dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass) as dBInstanceClass
| if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier),dBInstanceIdentifier,dBClusterIdentifier) as dbidentifier
| where dbidentifier matches "{{dbidentifier}}" or isempty(dbidentifier)
| count as event_count by event_name
| sort by event_count, event_name asc

"\"eventSource\":\"rds.amazonaws.com\"" *DBSecurityGroup* !DescribeDBSecurityGroups account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "errorCode", "errorMessage",  "requestID", "sourceIPAddress" as eventTime, event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, error_code, error_message, requestID, src_ip nodrop
| where event_source = "rds.amazonaws.com" and event_name matches "*DBSecurityGroup*" and event_name<>"DescribeDBSecurityGroups"
| json field=userIdentity "accountId", "arn", "userName", "type" as accountId, arn, username, type nodrop
| parse field=arn ":assumed-role/*" as user nodrop | parse field=arn "arn:aws:iam::*:*" as accountId, user nodrop
| json field=requestParameters "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier", "dBSnapshotIdentifier", "dBSecurityGroupName" as engine1, dBInstanceClass1, dBClusterIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBSnapshotIdentifier, dBSecurityGroupName  nodrop  
| json field=responseElements "dBName", "engine", "dBInstanceClass", "dBClusterIdentifier", "dBInstanceIdentifier" as dbName, engine2, dBInstanceClass2, dBClusterIdentifier2, dBInstanceIdentifier2 nodrop
| concat (dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier2) as dBInstanceIdentifier | concat (engine1, engine2) as engine | concat (dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass2) as dBInstanceClass | concat (dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier2) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier1), dBInstanceIdentifier1, dBInstanceIdentifier) as dBInstanceIdentifier
| if (!isEmpty(engine1), engine1, engine) as engine
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceClass1), dBInstanceClass1, dBInstanceClass) as dBInstanceClass
| if (!isEmpty(dBClusterIdentifier1), dBClusterIdentifier1, dBClusterIdentifier) as dBClusterIdentifier
| if (isEmpty(error_code), "Success", "Failure") as event_status
| if (isEmpty(userName), user, userName) as user
| if (!isEmpty(dBInstanceIdentifier),dBInstanceIdentifier,dBClusterIdentifier) as dbidentifier
| where dbidentifier matches "{{dbidentifier}}" or isempty(dbidentifier)
| count as Frequency by eventTime, event_name,  dbidentifier, engine, dBSecurityGroupName, type, user, region, src_ip, event_status, error_code, error_message, dBInstanceClass, dbName
| sort by eventTime | limit 100

children.name: 04. Amazon RDS - Aurora MySQL
children.description: The Amazon RDS Aurora MySQL dashboard provides intuitive Aurora MySQL performance data from across your infrastructure for latency, throughput, active and blocked transactions, queries, login failures, and replica lag.
children.title: 04. Amazon RDS - Aurora MySQL

children.name: 05. Amazon RDS - Aurora MySQL Global Database and Backtrack Activity
children.description: The Amazon RDS Aurora MySQL Global Database and BackTrack Activity dashboard provides insights into Aurora MySQL performance data from across your infrastructure for Global Database activity and Backtrack activity.
children.title: 05. Amazon RDS - Aurora MySQL Global Database and Backtrack Activity

panels.title: Backtrack Change Records Creation Rate

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=BacktrackChangeRecordsCreationRate statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

panels.description: The number of backtrack change records created over five minutes for your DB cluster.

panels.title: Backtrack Change Records Stored

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=BacktrackChangeRecordsStored statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

panels.description: The actual number of backtrack change records used by your DB cluster.

panels.title: Backtrack Window Actual

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=BacktrackWindowActual statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

panels.description: The difference between the target backtrack window and the actual backtrack window.

panels.title: Backtrack Window Alert

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=BacktrackWindowAlert statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

panels.description: The number of times that the actual backtrack window is smaller than the target backtrack window for a given period of time.

panels.title: Aurora Global DB Replicated Write IO

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=AuroraGlobalDBReplicatedWriteIO statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

panels.description: In an Aurora Global Database, the number of write I/O operations replicated from the primary AWS Region to the cluster volume in a secondary AWS Region. The billing calculations for the secondary AWS Regions in a global database use VolumeWriteIOPS to account for writes performed within the cluster. The billing calculations for the primary AWS Region in a global database use VolumeWriteIOPS to account for the write activity within that cluster, and AuroraGlobalDBReplicatedWriteIO to account for cross-region replication within the global database.

panels.title: Aurora Global DB Data Transfer Bytes

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=AuroraGlobalDBDataTransferBytes statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

panels.description: In an Aurora Global Database, the amount of redo log data transferred from the master AWS Region to a secondary AWS Region.

panels.title: Aurora Global DB Replication Lag

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=AuroraGlobalDBReplicationLag statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} | avg by dbidentifier, account, region, namespace

panels.description: For an Aurora Global Database, the amount of lag when replicating updates from the primary AWS Region, in milliseconds.

children.name: 06. Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Overview
children.description: The Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Overview dashboard provides high-level analysis of database activity with details on authentication, connections, users, and slow query events using RDS CloudWatch logs.
children.title: 06. Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Overview

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit CONNECT
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message ",*,*,*,*,0,*,*,,0" as instance, user, host, f1, action, database nodrop
| where action = "CONNECT"
| count as event_count

linkedDashboards.relativePath: ../09. Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Audit Log Analysis

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error "Access denied for user"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message " [*] " as LogLevel
| parse field=message " * [Note] Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as requestid, user, host, authenticationType, flag nodrop
| parse field=message "[Warning] Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, authenticationType, flag nodrop
| where host != "localhost"
| count by host
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip = host

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*general Connect
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "\s*\d+\s+(?<cmdType>\S+)\s*(?<command>.*)"
| where cmdType = "Connect"
| parse field=command "*@* on  using *" as user, host, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=command "*@* on * using *" as user, host, database, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=command "Out\t*@*:*" as user, host, port nodrop
| parse field=message "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, autenticationType, flag nodrop
| if (message matches "*Access denied*", "Fail", "Success") as connectionStatus
| where !isEmpty(connectionType)
| count as frequency by connectionType
| sort by frequency, connectionType asc

panels.title: Top Users and IPs Firing Slow Queries

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=*SlowQuery "User@Host" "Query_time"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host:\s*\S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\]\s*@\s*\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s*Id:\s*(?<Id>\d*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host:\s*\S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\]\s*@\s*(?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s*(?<Id>\d+)"
| parse regex field=query_block "# Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=query_block "SET timestamp=(?<set_timestamp>\d*);\n(?<sql_cmd>[\s\S]*);" nodrop
| parse regex field=sql_cmd "[^a-zA-Z]*(?<sql_cmd_type>[a-zA-Z]+)\s*"
| where user != "rdsadmin" and !isEmpty(user)
| count as frequency by user, host_name, ip_addr
| top 15 user, ip_addr by frequency, ip_addr asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error Note
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message "[*] *" as LogLevel, msgDetails
| where LogLevel = "Note"
| count as event_count

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error "Access denied for user"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message " [*] " as LogLevel
| parse field=message " * [Note] Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as requestid, user, host, authenticationType, flag nodrop
| parse field=message "[Warning] Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, authenticationType, flag nodrop

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error Warning

| parse field=message "[*] *" as LogLevel, msgDetails

| count as event_count

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*SlowQuery "User@Host" "Query_time"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host:\s*\S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\]\s*@\s*\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s*Id:\s*(?<Id>\d*)" nodrop

| parse regex field=query_block "# Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" nodrop

| parse regex field=sql_cmd "[^a-zA-Z]*(?<sql_cmd_type>[a-zA-Z]+)\s*"
| where user != "rdsadmin"

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit FAILED_CONNECT
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message ",*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*" as instance, user, host, f1, f2, action, database, f3, f4 nodrop
| where action matches "FAILED_CONNECT"

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*SlowQuery "User@Host" "Query_time"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host:\s*\S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\]\s*@\s*\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s*Id:\s*(?<Id>\d*)" nodrop

| parse regex field=query_block "# Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" nodrop

panels.title: Top Slow Queries by Cmd Type

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*SlowQuery "User@Host" "Query_time"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host:\s*\S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\]\s*@\s*\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s*Id:\s*(?<Id>\d*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host:\s*\S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\]\s*@\s*(?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s*(?<Id>\d+)"
| parse regex field=query_block "# Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=query_block "SET timestamp=(?<set_timestamp>\d*);\n(?<sql_cmd>[\s\S]*);" nodrop
| parse regex field=sql_cmd "[^a-zA-Z]*(?<sql_cmd_type>[a-zA-Z]+)\s*"
| where user != "rdsadmin" 
| where !isEmpty(sql_cmd_type)
| toUpperCase(sql_cmd_type)
| count as frequency group by sql_cmd_type
| top 15 sql_cmd_type by frequency, sql_cmd_type asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit CONNECT
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message

| where action = "CONNECT" and host != "localhost"
| count by host
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip = host

children.name: 07. Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Error Logs Analysis
children.description: The Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Error Logs Analysis dashboard provides details for error logs, including failed authentications, error outliers, top and recent warnings, log levels, and aborted connections.
children.title: 07. Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Error Logs Analysis

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error "Access denied for user"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message " [*] " as LogLevel
| parse field=message " * [Note] Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as requestid, user, host, authenticationType, flag nodrop
| parse field=message "[Warning] Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, authenticationType, flag nodrop
| count as frequency by host
| top 10 host by frequency, host asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message " [*] " as LogLevel
| timeslice 15m
| count as errorEvents by _timeslice
| outlier errorEvents window=10,threshold=3,consecutive=1,direction=+-

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error "Access denied for user"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message " [*] " as LogLevel
| parse field=message " * [Note] Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as requestid, user, host, authenticationType, flag nodrop
| parse field=message "[Warning] Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, authenticationType, flag nodrop
| timeslice 15m
| count as event_count by _timeslice

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error "Aborted connection"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message " [*] " as LogLevel
| parse field=message "Aborted connection * to db: '*' user: '*' host: '*' (*)" as requestId, database, user, host, errorDetails nodrop
| timeslice 1s
| count as frequency by _timeslice, dbidentifier, requestId, database, user, host, errorDetails
| sort by _timeslice

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error Warning
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message "[*] *" as LogLevel, msgDetails
| where LogLevel = "Warning"
| count as frequency by msgDetails
| top 10 msgDetails by frequency, msgDetails asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message " [*] " as LogLevel
|count by LogLevel
| sort by _count, LogLevel asc

account=* region=* namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier=* _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error (mysqld or starts or restarts or "starting as process") 
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message " [*] " as LogLevel
| parse field=message "* [Note] /rdsdbbin/oscar/bin/*: *" as requestid, process, msg nodrop
| parse field=message "* [Note] /rdsdbbin/oscar/bin/* (*) * ..." as requestid, process, processDetails, msg nodrop
| parse field=msg "Version: '*'  socket: '*'  port: *  *" as version, socket, port, license nodrop
| parse field=message "/rdsdbbin/mysql/bin/* (*) starting as process" as process, processDetails nodrop
| parse field=message "/rdsdbbin/oscar/bin/* (*) starting as process" as process, processDetails nodrop
| parse field=message "/rdsdbbin/mysql/bin/*: * (*)  *." as process, status, processDetails, license nodrop
| parse field=message "/rdsdbbin/mysql/bin/*: *. Version: '*'  socket: '*'  port: *  *." as process, status, version, socket, port, license nodrop
| parse field=message "/rdsdbbin/mysql/bin/*: *  user: '*'." as process, status, user nodrop
| parse field=message "Received SHUTDOWN from user *. Shutting down * (Version: *)." as  user, process, version nodrop
| parse field=message "/rdsdbbin/mysql/bin/* (initiated by: *[rdsadmin] @ * []): Normal shutdown" as process, user, host nodrop
| parse field= message "/rdsdbbin/mysql/bin/*: Shutdown complete" as process nodrop
| if (message matches "*starting as process*", "starting as process", if (message matches "*ready for connections*", "ready for connections", if (message matches "* Shutting down *", "Shutting down", if (message matches "* Normal shutdown", "Normal shutdown", if (message matches "* Shutdown complete", "Shutdown complete", status))))) as status
| timeslice 1s
| count as frequency by _timeslice, dbidentifier, process, status, processDetails, version, socket, port, user, license
| sort by _timeslice

account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Error "Access denied for user"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message " [*] " as LogLevel
| parse field=message " * [Note] Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as requestid, user, host, authenticationType, flag nodrop
| parse field=message "[Warning] Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, authenticationType, flag nodrop
| timeslice 1s
| count as frequency by _timeslice, requestid, user, host, authenticationType, flag

children.name: 08. Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Slow Query Analysis
children.description: The Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Slow Query Analysis dashboard provides details on slow queries, including the number of slow queries, trends, execution times, time comparisons, command types, users, and IP addresses.
children.title: 08. Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Slow Query Analysis

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*SlowQuery "User@Host" "Query_time"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<query_block># User@Host:[\S\s]+?SET timestamp=\d+;[\S\s]+?;)" multi
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host:\s*\S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\]\s*@\s*\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s*Id:\s*(?<Id>\d*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=query_block "# User@Host:\s*\S+?\[(?<user>\S*?)\]\s*@\s*(?<host_name>\S+)\s\[(?<ip_addr>\S*?)\]\s+Id:\s*(?<Id>\d+)"
| where user != "rdsadmin" and !isEmpty(user) and user matches "{{user}}"
| where !isEmpty(ip_addr) and ip_addr matches "{{ip_address}}"
| parse regex field=query_block "# Query_time:\s+(?<query_time>[\d.]*)\s+Lock_time:\s+(?<lock_time>[\d.]*)\s+Rows_sent:\s+(?<rows_sent>[\d]*)\s+Rows_examined:\s+(?<rows_examined>[\d]*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=query_block "SET timestamp=(?<set_timestamp>\d*);\n(?<sql_cmd>[\s\S]*);" nodrop
| parse regex field=sql_cmd "[^a-zA-Z]*(?<sql_cmd_type>[a-zA-Z]+)\s*"
| timeslice 15m
| count as queriesCount by _timeslice

children.name: 09. Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Audit Log Analysis
children.description: The Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Audit Logs Analysis dashboard provides an analysis of audit logs, including successful, failed db connections, most active users, clients, databases along with various SQL commands being executed on the RDS instances and clusters.
children.title: 09. Amazon RDS - MySQL Logs - Audit Log Analysis

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit CONNECT
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message ",*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*" as instance, user, host, f1, f2, action, database, f3, f4 nodrop
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| where action = "CONNECT"
| count as eventCount

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit QUERY
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<msgTime>\d*),(?<instance>[^,]*),(?<user>[^,]*),(?<host>[^,]*),(?<f1>[^,]*),(?<f2>[^,]*),(?<action>[^,]*),(?<database>[^,]*),\'(?<sqlStatement>.*\'?(?=\'\,))\',(?<f3>\d*)" nodrop
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| count as frequency by host
| top 10 host by frequency, host asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit CONNECT
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message ",*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*" as instance, user, host, f1, f2, action, database, f3, f4 nodrop
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| where action = "CONNECT" and host != "localhost"
| count as user_count by host
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip = host

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit QUERY user (*crea* or *alte* or *drop)
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<msgTime>\d*),(?<instance>[^,]*),(?<user>[^,]*),(?<host>[^,]*),(?<f1>[^,]*),(?<f2>[^,]*),(?<action>[^,]*),(?<database>[^,]*),\'(?<sqlStatement>.*\'?(?=\'\,))\',(?<f3>\d*)" nodrop
| parse field=database "Access denied for user '*'@'*' to database '*'"  as user1, host1, database1 nodrop
| if (database matches "Access denied for user*", database1, database) as database
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "/\*[^*/]*\*/\s*(?<sqlStatement2>.*)" nodrop // incase start of command is commented.
| where action = "QUERY"
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| where !isEmpty(sqlStatement) and ( host != "localhost" or user != "rdsadmin")
| if (!isEmpty(sqlStatement2), sqlStatement2, sqlStatement) as sqlStatement
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "(?<command>\S+)\s+"
| toUppercase(command) as command
| where (command matches "*CREA*" or command matches "*ALTE*" or command matches "*DROP*") and (toUppercase(sqlStatement) matches "* USER *")
| timeslice 1s
| count as frequency by _timeslice, action, user, host, database, command, sqlStatement
| sort by _timeslice, command asc
| limit 20

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit FAILED_CONNECT
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message ",*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*" as instance, user, host, f1, f2, action, database, f3, f4 nodrop
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| where action matches "FAILED_CONNECT"
| count as eventCount

panels.title: Multiple Host Connecting To DB With Same User

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit CONNECT
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message ",*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*" as instance, user, host, f1, f2, action, database, f3, f4 nodrop
| where action = "CONNECT"
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| count_distinct (host) as %"UniqueHosts" by user
| 0 as threshold // Feel free to change this threshold value based on your need. Anything above 0 is good
| where %"UniqueHosts" > threshold
| sort by %"UniqueHosts", user asc
| fields -threshold

| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message ",*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*" as instance, user, host, f1, f2, action, database, f3, f4 nodrop
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| where action in ("CONNECT", "DISCONNECT", "FAILED_CONNECT")
| count by action
| sort by _count, action asc

| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| where action in ("CONNECT", "DISCONNECT", "FAILED_CONNECT")
| timeslice 15m
| count as event_count by _timeslice, action
| transpose row _timeslice column action

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit QUERY *DROP*
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<msgTime>\d*),(?<instance>[^,]*),(?<user>[^,]*),(?<host>[^,]*),(?<f1>[^,]*),(?<f2>[^,]*),(?<action>[^,]*),(?<database>[^,]*),\'(?<sqlStatement>.*\'?(?=\'\,))\',(?<f3>\d*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "/\*[^*/]*\*/\s*(?<sqlStatement2>.*)" nodrop // incase start of command is commented.
| parse field=database "Access denied for user '*'@'*' to database '*'"  as user1, host1, database1 nodrop
| if (database matches "Access denied for user*", database1, database) as database
| where action = "QUERY"
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| where !isEmpty(sqlStatement) and ( host != "localhost" or user != "rdsadmin")
| if (!isEmpty(sqlStatement2), sqlStatement2, sqlStatement) as sqlStatement
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "(?<command>\S+)\s+"
| toUppercase(command) as command
| where command = "DROP" or toUppercase(sqlStatement) matches "* DROP *"
| timeslice 1s
| count as frequency by _timeslice, action, user, host, database, command, sqlStatement
| sort by _timeslice, command asc
| limit 20

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit QUERY
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message

| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| where !isEmpty(user)

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit FAILED_CONNECT

| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit QUERY
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<msgTime>\d*),(?<instance>[^,]*),(?<user>[^,]*),(?<host>[^,]*),(?<f1>[^,]*),(?<f2>[^,]*),(?<action>[^,]*),(?<database>[^,]*),\'(?<sqlStatement>.*\'?(?=\'\,))\',(?<f3>\d*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "/\*[^*/]*\*/\s*(?<sqlStatement2>.*)" nodrop // incase start of command is commented.
| where action = "QUERY"

| if (!isEmpty(sqlStatement2), sqlStatement2, sqlStatement) as sqlStatement

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit QUERY
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<msgTime>\d*),(?<instance>[^,]*),(?<user>[^,]*),(?<host>[^,]*),(?<f1>[^,]*),(?<f2>[^,]*),(?<action>[^,]*),(?<database>[^,]*),\'(?<sqlStatement>.*\'?(?=\'\,))\',(?<f3>\d*)" nodrop

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit CONNECT
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message ",*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*,*" as instance, user, host, f1, f2, action, database, f3, f4 nodrop
| where action = "CONNECT"
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
|count_distinct (user) as %"UniqueUsers" by host
| 0 as threshold // Feel free to change this threshold value based on your need. Anything above 0 is good
| where %"UniqueUsers" > threshold
| sort by %"UniqueUsers", host asc
| fields -threshold

| where action not in ("QUERY", "CONNECT", "DISCONNECT", "FAILED_CONNECT")
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| count by action
| sort by _count, action asc

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit QUERY (*COMM* or *ROLLB* or *SAVE* or *SET* or *TRAN*)
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<msgTime>\d*),(?<instance>[^,]*),(?<user>[^,]*),(?<host>[^,]*),(?<f1>[^,]*),(?<f2>[^,]*),(?<action>[^,]*),(?<database>[^,]*),\'(?<sqlStatement>.*\'?(?=\'\,))\',(?<f3>\d*)" nodrop
| parse field=database "Access denied for user '*'@'*' to database '*'"  as user1, host1, database1 nodrop
| if (database matches "Access denied for user*", database1, database) as database
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "/\*[^*/]*\*/\s*(?<sqlStatement2>.*)" nodrop // incase start of command is commented.
| where !isEmpty(sqlStatement) and ( host != "localhost" or user != "rdsadmin")
| where action = "QUERY"
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}" and database matches "{{database}}"
| if (!isEmpty(sqlStatement2), sqlStatement2, sqlStatement) as sqlStatement
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "(?<command>\S+)\s+"
| if (isEmpty(command), sqlStatement, command) as command
| toUppercase(command) as command
| where (command matches "*COMM*" or command matches "*ROLLB*" or command matches "*SAVE*" or sqlStatement matches "*COMM*" or sqlStatement matches "*ROLLB*" or sqlStatement matches "*SAVE*" or sqlStatement matches "*SET*TRAN*")
| timeslice 1s
| count as count by _timeslice, action, user, host, database, command, sqlStatement
| sort by _timeslice, command asc
| limit 20

| if (database matches "Access denied for user*", database1, database) as database
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "/\*[^*/]*\*/\s*(?<sqlStatement2>.*)" nodrop // incase start of command is commented.
| where !isEmpty(sqlStatement) and ( host != "localhost" or user != "rdsadmin")
| where action = "QUERY"
| where user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}" and database matches "{{database}}"
| if (!isEmpty(sqlStatement2), sqlStatement2, sqlStatement) as sqlStatement
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "(?<command>\S+)\s+"
| toUppercase(command) as command
| where (command matches "*GRAN*" or command matches "*REVO*")
| timeslice 1s
| count as count by _timeslice, action, user, host, database, command, sqlStatement
| sort by _timeslice, command asc
| limit 20

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit QUERY (*crea* or *alte* or *drop* or *trun* or *comm* or *rena*)
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message

| parse field=database "Access denied for user '*'@'*' to database '*'"  as user1, host1, database1 nodrop
| if (database matches "Access denied for user*", database1, database) as database
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "/\*[^*/]*\*/\s*(?<sqlStatement2>.*)" nodrop // incase start of command is commented.
| where !isEmpty(sqlStatement) and ( host != "localhost" or user != "rdsadmin")
| where action = "QUERY"

| if (!isEmpty(sqlStatement2), sqlStatement2, sqlStatement) as sqlStatement
| parse regex field=sqlStatement "(?<command>\S+)\s+"
| toUppercase(command) as command
| where (command matches "*CREA*" or command matches "*ALTE*" or command matches "*DROP*" or command matches "*TRUN*" or command matches "*COMM*" or command matches "*RENA*")
| timeslice 1s
| count as count by _timeslice, action, user, host, database, command, sqlStatement
| sort by _timeslice, command
| limit 20

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*Audit QUERY
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "(?<msgTime>\d*),(?<instance>[^,]*),(?<user>[^,]*),(?<host>[^,]*),(?<f1>[^,]*),(?<f2>[^,]*),(?<action>[^,]*),(?<database>[^,]*),\'(?<sqlStatement>.*\'?(?=\'\,))\',(?<f3>\d*)" nodrop

| parse regex field=message "(?<msgTime>\d*),(?<instance>[^,]*),(?<user>[^,]*),(?<host>[^,]*),(?<f1>[^,]*),(?<f2>[^,]*),(?<action>[^,]*),(?<database>[^,]*),\'(?<sqlStatement>.*\'?(?=\'\,))\',(?<f3>\d*)" nodrop
| parse field=database "Access denied for user '*'@'*' to database '*'"  as user1, host1, database1 nodrop

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds*general Connect
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "\s*\d+\s+(?<cmdType>\S+)\s*(?<command>.*)"
| where cmdType = "Connect"
| parse field=command "*@* on  using *" as user, host, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=command "*@* on * using *" as user, host, database, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=command "Out\t*@*:*" as user, host, port nodrop
| parse field=message "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, autenticationType, flag nodrop
| where host != "localhost"
| if (message matches "*Access denied*", "Fail", "Success") as connectionStatus
| count as connectionAttempts

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds*general Connect
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message

| where cmdType = "Connect"
| parse field=command "*@* on  using *" as user, host, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=command "*@* on * using *" as user, host, database, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=message "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, autenticationType, flag nodrop
| if (message matches "*Access denied*", "Fail", "Success") as connectionStatus
| where !isEmpty(connectionType)
| timeslice 15m
| count by _timeslice, connectionType
| transpose row _timeslice column connectionType

| if (message matches "*Access denied*", "Fail", "Success") as connectionStatus
| count as failedConnections

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds*general Query (*COMM* or *ROLLB* or *SAVE* or *SET*TRAN*)
