| parse field=command "*@* on * using *" as user, host, database, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=command "Out\t*@*:*" as user, host, port nodrop
| parse field=message "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, autenticationType, flag nodrop
| if (message matches "*Access denied*", "Fail", "Success") as connectionStatus
| where !isEmpty(connectionType)
| count as event_count by connectionType
| sort by event_count, connectionType asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds*general Query (*crea* or *alte* or *drop* or *trun* or *comm* or *rena*)
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "\s*\d+\s+(?<cmdType>\S+)\s*(?<command>.*)"
| parse regex field=command "/\*[^*/]*\*/\s*(?<command2>.*)" nodrop // incase start of command is commented.
| where cmdType = "Query"
| if (!isEmpty(command2), command2, command) as command
| parse regex field=command "(?<sqlStatement>\S+)\s+"
| toUppercase(sqlStatement) as sqlStatement
| where (sqlStatement matches "*CREA*" or sqlStatement matches "*ALTE*" or sqlStatement matches "*DROP*" or sqlStatement matches "*TRUN*" or sqlStatement matches "*COMM*" or sqlStatement matches "*RENA*")
| timeslice 1s
| count as count by _timeslice, cmdType, sqlStatement, command
| sort by _timeslice, sqlStatement asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds*general Connect
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "\s*\d+\s+(?<cmdType>\S+)\s*(?<command>.*)"
| where cmdType = "Connect"
| parse field=command "*@* on  using *" as user, host, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=command "*@* on * using *" as user, host, database, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=command "Out\t*@*:*" as user, host, port nodrop
| parse field=message "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, autenticationType, flag nodrop
| if (message matches "*Access denied*", "Fail", "Success") as connectionStatus
| timeslice 15m
| count as %"ConnectionCount" by _timeslice, host
| transpose row _timeslice column host

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds*general
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "\s*\d+\s+(?<cmdType>\S+)\s*(?<command>.*)"
| count as event_count by cmdType
| sort by event_count, cmdType asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds*general Query *DROP*
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "\s*\d+\s+(?<cmdType>\S+)\s*(?<command>.*)"
| parse regex field=command "/\*[^*/]*\*/\s*(?<command2>.*)" nodrop // incase start of command is commented.
| where cmdType = "Query"
| if (!isEmpty(command2), command2, command) as command
| parse regex field=command "(?<sqlStatement>\S+)\s+"
| toUppercase(sqlStatement) as sqlStatement
| where sqlStatement = "DROP" or toUppercase(command) matches "* DROP *"
| timeslice 1s
| count as count by _timeslice, cmdType, sqlStatement, command
| sort by _timeslice, sqlStatement asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds*general Query (*GRAN* or *REVO*)
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "\s*\d+\s+(?<cmdType>\S+)\s*(?<command>.*)"
| parse regex field=command "/\*[^*/]*\*/\s*(?<command2>.*)" nodrop // incase start of command is commented.
| where cmdType = "Query"
| if (!isEmpty(command2), command2, command) as command
| parse regex field=command "(?<sqlStatement>\S+)\s+"
| toUppercase(sqlStatement) as sqlStatement
| where (sqlStatement matches "*GRAN*" or sqlStatement matches "*REVO*")
| timeslice 1s
| count as count by _timeslice, cmdType, sqlStatement, command
| sort by _timeslice, sqlStatement asc

account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds*general Query user (*crea* or *alte* or *drop)
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "\s*\d+\s+(?<cmdType>\S+)\s*(?<command>.*)"
| parse regex field=command "/\*[^*/]*\*/\s*(?<command2>.*)" nodrop // incase start of command is commented.
| where cmdType = "Query"
| if (!isEmpty(command2), command2, command) as command
| parse regex field=command "(?<sqlStatement>\S+)\s+"
| toUppercase(sqlStatement) as sqlStatement
| where (sqlStatement matches "*CREA*" or sqlStatement matches "*ALTE*" or sqlStatement matches "*DROP*") and (toUppercase(command) matches "* USER *")
| timeslice 1s
| count as count by _timeslice, cmdType, sqlStatement, command
| sort by _timeslice, sqlStatement asc

panels.title: Failed to  Connection Attempt Ratio - Outlier

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds*general Connect
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse regex field=message "\s*\d+\s+(?<cmdType>\S+)\s*(?<command>.*)"
| where cmdType = "Connect"
| parse field=command "*@* on  using *" as user, host, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=command "*@* on * using *" as user, host, database, connectionType nodrop
| parse field=command "Out\t*@*:*" as user, host, port nodrop
| parse field=message "Access denied for user '*'@'*' (using *: *)" as user, host, autenticationType, flag nodrop
| where host != "localhost"
| if (message matches "*Access denied*", 1, 0) as failedConnection
| timeslice 15m
| count as connectionAttempt, sum(failedConnection) as failedConnection by _timeslice
| (failedConnection/connectionAttempt)*100 as ratio
| outlier ratio

children.name: 14. Amazon RDS - PostgreSQL Logs - Slow Query Overview
children.description: The Amazon RDS - PostgreSQL Logs - Slow Query Overview dashboard provides an overview of the slow query logs. AWS RDS will report slow logs with statement taking more than threshold value given through log_min_duration_statement. This dashboard can be filtered with different values for query execution time through slow_query_latency_ms.
children.title: 14. Amazon RDS - PostgreSQL Logs - Slow Query Overview

panels.title: Top Slow Queries by Average Execution Time

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*postgresql dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} duration
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message "* * *:*(*):*@*:[*]:*:*" as date,time,time_zone,host,thread_id,user,database,processid,severity,msg 
| where database matches "{{database}}" and user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| parse regex field=msg "duration: (?<execution_time_ms>[\S]+) ms  (?<query>.+)" 
| number (execution_time_ms)
| where execution_time_ms > {{slow_query_latency_ms}}
| avg(execution_time_ms) as avgTime, sum(execution_time_ms) as totalTime, min(execution_time_ms) as minTime, max(execution_time_ms) as maxTime, count as frequency group by query,dbidentifier, database, user, host
| sort by avgTime | limit 100

| parse regex field=query "(?:\s|\\n|\n)+(?<sql_cmd_type>(?i)CREATE|DROP|ALTER|TRUNCATE|COMMENT|RENAME|SELECT|INSERT|UPDATE|DELETE|GRANT|INVOKE|BEGIN|COMMIT|ROLLBACK|REVOKE|SAVEPOINT)(?:\s|\\n|\n)+"
| timeslice 15m

| transpose row _timeslice column sql_cmd_type

| toUpperCase(query) as query
| parse regex field=query "(?:\s|\\n|\n)+(?<sql_cmd_type>(?i)CREATE|DROP|ALTER|TRUNCATE|COMMENT|RENAME|SELECT|INSERT|UPDATE|DELETE|GRANT|INVOKE|BEGIN|COMMIT|ROLLBACK|REVOKE|SAVEPOINT)(?:\s|\\n|\n)+"

| count as frequency by sql_cmd_type

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*postgresql dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} duration
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message "* * *:*(*):*@*:[*]:*:*" as date,time,time_zone,host,thread_id,user,database,processid,severity,msg 
| parse regex field=msg "duration: (?<execution_time_ms>[\S]+) ms  statement:(?<query>.+)" 
| where database matches "{{database}}" and user matches "{{user}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| number (execution_time_ms)
| where execution_time_ms > {{slow_query_latency_ms}}
| parse regex field=query "(?<command>\S+)\s*"
| toUppercase(command) as command
| count as event_count by Command
| sort by event_count, Command asc
| limit 10

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*postgresql dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} "authentication failed"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message "* * *:*(*):*@*:[*]:*:*" as date,time,time_zone,host,thread_id,user,database,processid,severity,msg

| parse field=message "* * *:*(*):*@*:[*]:*:*" as date,time,time_zone,host,thread_id,user,database,processid,severity,msg

| where user matches "{{user}}" and database matches "{{database}}" and host matches "{{host}}"

panels.title: Threat Intel Analysis of Incoming Connections

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*postgresql dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} connection
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message "* * *:*(*):*@*:[*]:*:*" as date,time,time_zone,host,thread_id,user,database,processid,severity,msg
| where user matches "{{user}}" and database matches "{{database}}" and host matches "{{host}}" 
| parse field=msg "connection received: host=* port=*" as ip,port 
| count by ip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=ip
| where type="ip_address" 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| count by type, actor, ip, malicious_confidence, label_name

| timeslice 15m
| count by _timeslice, host
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name from geo://location on ip = host
| where !isNull(latitude)
| sum(_count) as events by _timeslice, country_name
| transpose row _timeslice column country_name

children.description: The Amazon RDS - PostgreSQL Logs - Query Execution Time dashboard provides details around the time its taking to execute queries on your PostgreSQL instance.
children.title: 17. Amazon RDS - PostgreSQL Logs - Query Execution Time

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace=aws/rds _sourceHost=/aws/rds/*postgresql dbidentifier={{dbidentifier}} duration
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| parse field=message "* * *:*(*):*@*:[*]:*:*" as date,time,time_zone,host,thread_id,user,database,processid,severity,msg 
| where user matches "{{user}}" and database matches "{{database}}" and host matches "{{host}}"
| parse regex field=msg "duration: (?<execution_time_ms>[\S]+) ms" 
| number (execution_time_ms)
| timeslice 15m
| count by _timeslice, database
| transpose row _timeslice column database
